entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 near midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 9:50 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
